text:
Luigi De Filippo (10 August 1930 – 31 March 2018) was an Italian actor, stage director and playwright. He was known for his movie role in "Non è vero... ma ci credo", "You're on Your Own", and in "Love Italian Style".
De Filippo died in Rome on 31 March 2018 of Alzheimer's disease at the age of 87.

annotations.surface_form: Non è vero... ma ci credo
